doc.name: productDetailsReceived
doc.summary: sent by the store in case a request for specific product details (sent via mobileStoreRequestProductsDetails command) is successful

description.overview: Use the productDetailsReceived message to get details for a specific product

parameter.name: productID
parameter.description: Is the identifier of the product for which the request for details was made

parameter.name: details
parameter.description: Is an array that contains information about the specified product. The keys of this array slightly vary, depending on the store (See comments below)

description.comments:
The message productDetailsReceived is sent in response to mobileStoreRequestProductDetails command, when the request is successful. The details are returned in the second parameter, details, which is an array with the following keys, that shightly differ depending on the platform (android/iOS):
For android stores (Google/Amazon/Samsung), the keys are :
- productID : the identifier of the requested product
- price : price of requested product
- description : description of requested product
- title : title of requested product
- itemType : type of requested product
- itemImageUrl : the URL where the image of the requested product is stored
- itemDownloadUrl : the URL to download the requested product
- subscriptionDurationUnit : subscription duration unit of requested product
- subscriptionDurationMultiplier : subscription duration multiplier of requested product
For iOS store (Apple), the keys are the following:
- price : price of requested product
- description : description of requested product
- title : title of requested product
- currency code : price currency code of requested product
- currency symbol : currency symbol of requested product
- unicode description : unicode description of requested product
- unicode title : unicode title of requested product
- unicode currency symbol : unicode currency symbol of requested product
